mdRecord.dcterms:title: Loom, 30 Inch. Floor Loom
mdRecord.dcterms:description: A Relatively Modern 20th century Loom that has a 30 inch capacity warp. This loom has been repaired and is fully functional. A warp has been installed so that the loom is ready to weave and use for demonstrations.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Looms
Weaving
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
